alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 08 at 10:31AM MDT until June 11 at 5:34AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM MDT Thursday was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain in minor flood for the next several days. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 06/07/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 4.4 Thu 10 am MD 4.4 4.2 3.9 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
